pr_title: Open DevTools directly using pub for external projects

timeline.message: Add DevTools opening directly from pub for external

timeline.bodyText:
later -> latter
instead of devtools.serve I assume you mean flutter daemon?
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: I meant later here, i.e. flutter versions after the change in flutter/flutter. I hopefully clarified daemon/devtools.serve in the updated comments
replies.author: helin24

timeline.bodyText: doesn't this file need an API to query to make sure devtools is done serving? Otherwise we'll launch devtools URLs that fail? a user could run an app very quickly after opening the project and hit a case where devtools isn't fully running yet.
timeline.author: jacob314

replies.bodyText: Yes, I was thinking a method like getDevToolsUrl would return a future but wasn't planning to add in this change. Is that what you mean?
replies.author: helin24

replies.bodyText: Yes. That is what I mean.
replies.author: jacob314
